entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
